title: Fromann Remote Hand Control Recliner Chair Electric Controller Replacement Handset with 6 Button 5 pin for Adjustable Hospital Bed Lift Chair with Okin Okimat II Motor
features: 【Longer & Stretchable Cable】：Our lift chair hand controls feature a coiled wire + cable design solution,total cord lenth approximately 6.6 ft ,which increases the length of the cable, making operation more convenient and storage easier and simpler.

【Easy to Install】:The adjustable bed handset remote for electric bed has 90 Degree Angle Plug at the end, 5 pin connection plugs directly into the motor,and 6 Button 5 Pin Connection to the motor, up and down buttons for two motors.

【Range of Applications】OEM Okin 6 Button 5 Pin Hand Control Remote for Adjustable Hospital Bed with Okimat Motor by Okin.Even if the original recliner chair remote control is lost or damaged you no longer have to worry about spending more money to repair or buy a new hospital bed.

【Easy to Use】:The recliner bed remote six-button design allows the feet or head to be raised or lowered individually, or adjusted simultaneously with one button using the middle button. The operating interface is clear and unambiguous.
【After-sales service】: We provide 24-hour after-sales service, if you encounter any problems in the process of use please feel free to contact us, we are happy to provide service for you!
